attributes.action: Call a referendum before handing over any more powers to the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Call a referendum before handing over any more powers to the European Union

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/eumembership/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
